{"games":[{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1591062,"totalDownVotes":183106,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":345399,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.

RP Set- A term used to identify a house or structure that has a central theme that can be more specifically roleplayed with. It will be marked different than a normal house.

Thanks for playing!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":823830,"totalDownVotes":59118,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[UPDATE 14] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":92816,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔵🔴 UPDATE 14 OUT NOW! 🔴🔵
Rumble Awakening + Island + Cyborg ++ MORE!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4574445,"totalDownVotes":879881,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":176498,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Careers, Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Credits: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/am/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":9213039,"creatorName":"Sulley","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":182823,"totalDownVotes":10851,"universeId":2324662457,"name":"[UPDATE 5] Anime Fighters Simulator","placeId":6299805723,"playerCount":71300,"imageToken":"T_6299805723_c6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Anime Fighters!

Make sure to hit the FOLLOW button to be notified of new updates!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4294803,"creatorName":"Fireheart Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":134199,"totalDownVotes":18056,"universeId":1650291138,"name":"Demonfall [UPDATE 1.3] ","placeId":4855457388,"playerCount":40295,"imageToken":"T_4855457388_e0ab","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"[IMPORTANT] Demonfall is currently in Beta, Frequent shutdowns and bugs should be expected after an update.

[WARNING]
Mobile still in beta, bugs can happens

This game is not a bandit beating simulator, this game is very different, expect some difficulty

Demonfall is based on the popular series Demon Slayer.

Ascend the hill with the power of humanity on your shoulder, and fight for survival along with your comrades; or head down the ravine to lose ones humanity, and live as a demon with unholy powers.
Fight, explore, learn, grow, eat, all common necessities and virtues of one, despite your path, in this world, its the survival of the fittest.

Level cap: 50

[Controls]
R - Unsheathe Sword
Tab - Menu Toggle Tab --> Configuration = Reset
M - Meditate [Skill Tree]
H - Toggle Emotes
Sprint + M1 - Lunge
Block + M1 - Shoulder Bash
C - Rush
G - Breathe
Q - Dash
F - Block","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4133087,"totalDownVotes":345538,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":80185,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":657604,"totalDownVotes":47369,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[MORE ORBS!] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":48340,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

Controls:
[Shift]: Sprint
[E]: Open inventory

How to play BedWars:
📡 Join the "BedWars" queue in the Lobby to find a match
🛌 Protect your bed. Once it's gone, you can no longer respawn!
💎 Gather resources to purchase items and team upgrades
🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the match!

If you've played SkyWars before, you'll pickup BedWars in no time!","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2214290,"totalDownVotes":301803,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":47219,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌊 Summer Wave 1: Welcome to Summer World, Diamond Beach! (LIVE)✅
🌊Surprise Monstercat Event! (LIVE)✅
🌊 Wave 2: Quests ☐
🌊 Wave 3: Fair Pier ☐

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3086360,"totalDownVotes":398707,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":28110,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"The summer update is now out! ","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":780421,"totalDownVotes":101651,"universeId":1659645941,"name":"Islands 🏴‍☠️ [PIRATES!]","placeId":4872321990,"playerCount":30368,"imageToken":"T_4872321990_db87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌲 Build your own island

Cr Clothing : Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":5202664,"creatorName":"BlockZone","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1108354,"totalDownVotes":56785,"universeId":1348402608,"name":"5X EVENT✨ Anime Fighting Simulator","placeId":4042427666,"playerCount":23323,"imageToken":"T_4042427666_fd51","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Anime Fighting Simulator is a training game inspired by multiple popular Anime shows.

- 💸SALE!

⭐Join BlockZone for a 5% increased training boost:
https://www.roblox.com/groups/5202664/BlockZone#!/about

BlockZone: @BlockZone_

Builder: @BIack_Smith
Modeler: @Mirror_RBX","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":356387,"totalDownVotes":182462,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":29069,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4509459,"totalDownVotes":610938,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":21349,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 


THE JULY 2021 UPDATE has arrived!
🚀 ALL NEW VOLT! Free upgrade! 
💥 Destruction! Trees, stoplights and more!
🚨 SENTINEL POLICE TRANSPORTER! At the Military Base!
👮‍♀️ POLICE HQ! With gun shop and garage!
👋 PLAYER MARKERS! and more!
As always, thanks for all the love!!

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2405167,"totalDownVotes":728315,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":50257,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?

For support go to support.yx.zone","genre":""},{"creatorId":4914494,"creatorName":"Paradoxum Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":645100,"totalDownVotes":47175,"universeId":1176784616,"name":"Tower Defense Simulator","placeId":3260590327,"playerCount":21098,"imageToken":"T_3260590327_d762","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"In this world, no one can survive alone. --- 300% more health!

Welcome to Southwest Florida! Based around the Bonita Springs area, Southwest Florida is a roleplay game that offers a variety of jobs, vehicles, and more! 

⚠️ This game is not complete and some features are missing.

⚠️ This is a large game and lower end PCs, laptops, phones, and tablets may experience performance issues.

Controls
- "V" to toggle walk/jog, hold "Shift" to run
- Semi & Auto: "E" to upshift, "Q" to downshift ("X" and "Y" on Xbox)
- Manual: Use the "Shift" key ("RB" on Xbox) to control clutch while shifting
- Hold left-CTRL while accelerating to wheelie on a bike
- Cops & criminals have to enable PvP (bottom right) in order to do damage
